title: Episode 139 – Nisha Mary Poulose, Executive Director, Regenerative Rising
subtitle: ABOUT REGENERATIVE RISING
description: Regenerative Rising is a global network of change-makers. From food systems and economic systems to built environments and community settings, Regenerative Rising’s impact crosses ethnic, geographic, socio-economic, and cultural boundaries. By cultivating agility, adaptability, and reintegration, the organization is a vessel for deep systemic change that is restoring the power of the archetypal feminine into our human experience.
